  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/570</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/570</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La matèria orgànica com a font d'energia</string>
            <string language="en">Organic matter as a source of energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Organischer Stoff als Quelle von Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matière organique comme source d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matéria orgânica como uma fonte da energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materia organica come sorgente di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργανική ουσία ως πηγή ενέργειας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Treball de recerca sobre l'ús de la biomassa com a font d'energia alternativa. Conté un apartat sobre el biogas i un altre sobre instal.lacions industrials, així com enllaços externs per ampliar informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Research task on the use of biomass as a source of alternative energy. It includes a section on biogas and another one on industrial installations, as well as external links for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">energies alternatives</string>
            <string language="en">alternative energies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ecologia</string>
            <string language="en">ecology</string>
            <string language="es">ecología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">medi ambient</string>
            <string language="en">environment</string>
            <string language="es">medio ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung Aufgabe auf dem Gebrauch der 
Lebendmasse als Quelle der alternativen Energie. Sie schließt 
ein Kapitel auf biogas und einem anderen auf industriellen 
Installationen, sowie externe Links für weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La recherche chargent sur l'utilisation de
la biomasse comme source d'énergie alternative. Elle inclut une
section sur des biogas et des encore sur les installations 
industrielles, aussi bien que des liens externes pour de plus amples 
informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tarefa da pesquisa no uso do biomass como uma 
fonte da energia alternativa. Inclui uma seção em biogas e em 
um outro em instalações industriais, as.well.as as ligações 
externas para uma informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Operazione di ricerca sull'uso della biomassa 
come sorgente di energia alternativa. Include una sezione sui 
biogas ed altro sulle installazioni industriali, così come i 
collegamenti esterni per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνητική στοιχειώδης εργασία στη χρήση της βιομάζας
ως πηγή εναλλακτικής ενέργειας. Περιλαμβάνει ένα τμήμα 
βιοαερίου και ενός άλλου ενός στις βιομηχανικές εγκαταστάσεις, 
καθώς επίσης και τις εξωτερικές συνδέσεις για περισσότερες 
πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">alternative Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergies alternatives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">environnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energias alternativas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energie alternative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ecologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ambiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιβάλλον</string>
          </keyword>
